divs: Sighting Detailswatching west, iknow the flight paths that come over this area. two to three different objects. came ese over lake then went wnw. changing flashing strobes.blue bright in color. then other lights to the south, and one went to the north over the lake. looked like planes chasing one object. still seeing them at this time.
Summary: Lights over Lake MI., then over Berrien Co.
trends: There has been one other sighting in New Buffalo
